Cahira:
Hello adventurer,
I am the gatekeeper to another dimension where all the raidbosses of the world are spawned and ready to fight you. Are you ready to fight? Bring your friends. Teleportion in cubic works in this instance.
Dungeon Info
Type Instance
Party Size 6-9
Duration 120 minutes
Reuse Once a week
Difficulty Easy - Impossible
Requirements Lvl 87+, 300+ PvPs, 50+ Fame
Restrictions None
Resurrections Allowed
Mobs Respawn No
Notes Raid any boss you want. (Gatekeeper Cookie)
